text:
fredknows.com | Senior Fronted Developer (Angular4) | Berlin | Fulltime

fred knows is an AI platform that enables companies to automate customer support. Check out our website to find out more: https://www.fredknows.com

You will be working on a core part of our product: Our administration panel that brings complex data and processes into an intuitive and easy-to-understand interface. As a fully frontend-dedicated developer you will have an important role in shaping the future of our product both tech- and interface-wise. Your ideas and expertise will be valuable for our product team to design new product features and to create an unique experience for our customers.

Skills:

* 4+ years of experience in a senior position for frontend development

* Deep experience in building applications with Angular2+

For more information, please contact us at tech-jobs@fredknows.com
